errors.product-stock-reached: The product {name} is only available {quantity} times
errors.product-out-of-stock: The product {name} is not available any more
errors.purchase-steps-quantity: The product {name} is not available in this quantity. The quantity was changed to %quantity%
errors.min-order-quantity: The quantity of product {name} did not meet the minimum order quantity threshold. The quantity has automatically been increased to %quantity%.
errors.shipping-method-blocked: The shipping method {name} is blocked for your current shopping cart.
errors.shipping-method-changed: {oldShippingMethodName} shipping is not available for your current cart, the shipping was changed to {newShippingMethodName}.
errors.payment-method-blocked: The payment method {name} is blocked for your current shopping cart.
errors.payment-method-changed: {oldPaymentMethodName} payment is not available for your current cart, the payment was changed to {newPaymentMethodName}.
errors.promotion-not-found: Promotion with code {code} could not be found.
errors.promotion-not-eligible: Promotion code valid - however, not all conditions were met and the discount was not applied. Once all conditions are met, the discount will be applied automatically.
errors.promotion-excluded: One or more discounts have been removed from the shopping cart, due to conflicts with other discounts. Once the conditions are met again, the discounts will be applied automatically.
errors.shipping-address-blocked: Shipping to the selected shipping address is currently not possible.
errors.billing-address-blocked: Billing to the selected address is not possible.
errors.shipping-address-invalid: The selected shipping address is not valid or incomplete. Please check your entries.
errors.billing-address-invalid: The selected billing address is not valid or incomplete. Please check your entries.
errors.cart-merged-hint: The current shopping cart might contain additional products that have been added and saved during a previous visit.
errors.product-not-found: The product could not be found.
errors.salutation-missing: A salutation is missing from your profile, please choose one during checkout.
errors.message-404: The requested page cannot be found.
errors.addToCartError: An error occurred while trying to add items to the shopping cart.
errors.message-403-ajax: Your session has expired. Please reload the page and try again.
errors.message-403: Your session has expired. Please return to the last page and try again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait %seconds% seconds before trying again.
errors.CHECKOUT__CART_INVALID_LINE_ITEM_QUANTIT: The quantity must be a positive integer. Given: {quantity}
errors.VIOLATION::CUSTOMER_EMAIL_NOT_UNIQUE: The email address {email} is already in use
errors.VIOLATION::VAT_ID_FORMAT_NOT_CORRECT: The VAT Reg.No. you have entered does not have the correct format.
errors.VIOLATION::ZIP_CODE_INVALID: The postal code you have entered does not have the correct format.
errors.FRAMEWORK__INVALID_UUID: The selected payment method does not exist.
errors.CHECKOUT__UNKNOWN_PAYMENT_METHOD: The selected payment method does not exist.
errors.CHECKOUT__ORDER_ORDER_ALREADY_PAID: The order with the order number {orderNumber} was already paid and cannot be edited afterwards.
errors.CHECKOUT__ORDER_ORDER_NOT_FOUND: This order could not be found.
